body_html:
Looking at you screenshot on how to visualize all the info, I'd say yes, goes in the right direction. Some things still 😉

  • please use a whitespace after the comma
  • rephrase "my interests" into "interested in" (since we don't have me / my elsewhere)
  • capitalize the field names - I think it's best practice to have headlines like "Technologies of Expertise" rather then "Technologies of expertise" (Rails has helpers for this ✌️ )

body:
Looking at you screenshot on how to visualize all the info, I'd say yes, goes in the right direction. Some things still 😉 
* please use a whitespace after the comma
* rephrase "my interests" into "interested in" (since we don't have me / my elsewhere)
* capitalize the field names - I think it's best practice to have headlines like "Technologies of Expertise" rather then "Technologies of expertise" (Rails has helpers for this ✌️  )
